EmailTemplate.description: Sends email when Documents Complete date is entered.
EmailTemplate.name: Documents Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Entity Documents are Complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Entities__c.AccName__c},
Good news! Your documents for {!Entities__c.Name} are complete and will ship shortly.
The next step in the process is to sign the required forms. Please watch the Binder Review walk-through here:
https://andersonadvisors.com/anderson-quick-start/
A scheduling link will appear at the end of the video. If you have any questions, you may make an appointment with a Professional Advisor then.
As always, if you need any help at all, your Law Coordinator or Client Account Manager is happy to assist.
Platinum Members: Log into your Platinum Portal to see real-time status of your new company via the Entity Tracker.
Thank you, Anderson Business Advisors, LLC
